channel.title: Posts on Efuasei
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Efuasei

item.title: ANNALYSA
item.description: ANNALYSA 1.☝️ My heart ♥️My heart dey race ..nobro dey chase me oh . My head dey spin . I make dizzy.😵‍💫I no sick .. so why e dey do me like adey wan faint? I tap the stairs top small . A for relax. 🧘‍♂️ E dey rain… weather make cool but a start dey sweat. The fuck dey go on ? 😖 Anna? My Anna ? The loml ?

item.title: WENDY
item.description: Wendy’s milk jugs. I didn’t notice it at first. 🤷🏿‍♀️ We were all kids or at least I thought I was. And then one day, it was all I could think about. 😑 Her boobs. Them jiggling in her shirt; when she walked in class ; when we played Ampe, when we marched to class from Assembly in the mornings singing Arise Ghana Youth. I’m pretty sure ghanaian youth weren’t the only ones arising .
